channel.title: BHost VPS?
channel.description: im not sure if i should even be posting this, let alone if this is the right place, if i am not correct on where to place this\if i should, please let me know and i shall remove..but anyway down to business. has anyone ever used BHost VPS services? im looking into a windows VPS and this seems to be the way to go since its cheap [i dont have alot of money >.>] and i want to use a windows VPS since i absolutely cant stand Linux. but if anyone could give me their opinions on this site i would really appreciate it :) btw heres a link to the site. https://www.bhost.net/index.php?vps thanks much in advance.

item.title: BHost VPS?
item.dc:creator: @l0lc0pt3r l0lc0pt3r
item.description:
@l0lc0pt3r wrote:

gergy008:

BHost did provide Maidenhead servers for speedtest.net. I think its worth a go.

thanks for the info. anyone else got any other info?
